info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Scorched Girl
collection.openText: I am coming to you. You, who will be reduced to ash like me.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was Normal, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a normal probability.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a high probability.
$0, who had escaped, exploded after being near their target for 5 seconds. Many of the staff nearby sustained burns from the incident.
